WANT TO ENGAGE THE MODERN BUYER ★ NEED A DIGITAL SELLING PROGRAMKevin Neary is Chief Sales Officer at Connectors, delivering results for sales leaders through a proprietary digital selling program that drives sales and revenues.   THE DIGITAL SELLING PROGRAM ★  Strategy - a sound strategy begins with a complete alignment with your sales organizations goals and objectives. This includes designing the USP, buyer personas, content writing and messaging templates, agreeing KPI's, optimizing across multiple digital channels. ★ Tools & Analytics – real-time data and insights on buyers is a key ingredient to a successful digital selling program. How to leverage these insights and what sales paths to follow to engage with buyers at the right time with the right message delivers competitive advantage. ★ Learning & Reinforcement – strategies tools and analytics must be complimented with human inputs to ensure the ongoing, consistent and optimal level of customer engagement across multiple channels and buyer touch points. Results can be measured for targeted RoI. The Connectors proprietary platform delivers as results based digital selling program that integrates your sales process with data analytics and digital  channels to help Fortune 5000 and Start-ups prosper in global markets. ► PROFESSIONAL SERVICES:-	Digital selling strategies design & implementation -      Digital sales campaign management-      Buyer and competitor monitoring -	Digital Social Selling Training-      Keynote speaking TECHNOLOGY:-	Digital sales tools evaluation & integration -      Interfaces, APIs, data extraction -	Database cleansing -	GDPR compliance Schedule a call with Kevin Neary here:  ☛ https://calendly.com/kevin-neary/30min ✆ US: 718.710.4537 EMEA: 353 87 2271371 ✉ kevin.neary@connections.io TOOLS & ANALYTICSConnectors.io, IBM Watson Analytics,  SAP Analytics, SAS, Oracle Analytics,  AMAZON, Salesforce, Pipedrive, Microsoft Dynamics, Pardot, HubSpot, Fusion.

Googles mission is to accelerate the growth of high potential Startups. Leveraging the skills and expertise of Google Digital Consultants, to provide skill based mentoring to high-potential Startups, helping them to structure for scale and get the most out of the web.Each participant receives hands-on mentoring, access to exclusive lectures, fire-side chats and workshops at the Google, EMEA HQ.

CeADAR is a leading research institute in the area of data analytics and visualization. The primary outputs of the CeADAR centre are prototypes of analytical solutions that can be quickly commercialized by our industry partners.The Centre has an extensive catalogue of technology demonstrators, IP and big data analytics technology reviews, which are all immediately available for evaluation by members.The Centre is also the focal point of a thriving data analytics ecosystem delivering seminars, conferences, and members’ networking events throughout the year

Orca Media Group is a consulting firm that invests time and resources in helping  organizations with: scientific research, rapid prototyping and GTM (Go-To-market) flow strategies, fund raising and financial management. We work with innovation driven business leaders to transfer knowledge to launch online business models and SaaS, DaaS, IaaS PaaS start-up business models for fintech, martech, salestech, healthtech, datatech and biotech industries. Inbound marketing, outbound marketing, sales process, sales methodologies: miller heiman, challenger sale.

summary: ENGAGE THE MODERN BUYER ★  DIGITAL SELLING STRATEGIESThe Modern Buyer is digitally driven and active on multiple channels. For sales leaders to align with this transformation the first steps are to identify the right buyer at the right time with the right message.   Digital & Social Selling can achieve this: ★  THE RIGHT BUYER LinkedIn. Your LinkedIn profile fully optimized for your digital and social selling efforts. Deliver value using content that’s relevant to buyers.★  AT THE RIGHT TIME Reach out at the right time and the buyer will welcome you with open arms. Find data and insights on inbound and outbound digital channels. Predict your buyers journey stage - then send the right message.★ WITH THE RIGHT MESSAGEEstablish yourself as a subject matter expert on inbound and outbound sales and digital marketing channels. Share content and give buyers a reason to think about you differently from your competitors.    You can get started and roll out a digital sales operation for small investment. Through the Connectors platform we firstly align our digital  strategies with your business goals and then deliver data feeds with insights & sales paths to ensure you consistently engage your buyers. Draw on our professional service team to rollout a Digital Selling Program, Sales Enablement, Sales Training, ABS (Account Based Sales)  Kevin Neary is available to talk with sales leaders!   ☛ https://calendly.com/kevin-neary/30min✆ US: 718.710.4537 EMEA: 353 87 2271371 ✉ kevin.neary@connections.io Kevin Neary background: as a sales leader I helped build the largest Unisys systems consultancy in the UK and exited to 3i. I then established a recruitment firm & exited when the business integrated with the parent group. I then established a telecoms recruitment firm which I managed for six years and then my research consultancy business ORCA Media Group market tested multiple innovative SaaS business models before commercializing @Connectors_
